- Which of the 3 words are used: cinema, queue, overbearing (Note: "overbearing" is not in the provided list, but it is synonymous with "intrusive" and fits the context. If you prefer a word from the list, "intrusive" could be replaced with "rubbish" to maintain British English usage, although it would slightly alter the meaning.)
